sentences.english: Next to our memories, and pale hems of the masters' gown.
sentences.chinese: 偏安于我们的记忆之侧，偏安于贤哲长袍退色的下摆。

sentences.english: And the constructing and strengthening of the line also brought about the conservative ideas in Wu.
sentences.chinese: 长江防线的巩固，促成了东吴君臣的偏安心理。

sentences.english: And did you exchange a walk on part in the war
sentences.chinese: 你宁愿偏安一隅，而不愿在战火中驰骋吗？
